Get to know XCHNG

Chainge (XCHNG) is all about making cross-chain transactions and DeFi solutions easy and seamless. It works with over 55 blockchain networks, making it super versatile. With Chainge, you can swap, send, and receive crypto assets across different blockchains with ease. This makes XCHNG a great tool for anyone looking to streamline their crypto activities and participate in DeFi without the usual hassles.

Learn about FLOKI

Floki Inu (FLOKI) started as a meme coin inspired by the Shiba Inu trend, but it's grown into much more. FLOKI now includes NFTs, DeFi, and gaming within its vibrant ecosystem. The community behind FLOKI is highly active and always buzzing with new ideas and innovations. Whether you're into collecting unique NFTs or diving into DeFi protocols, FLOKI offers a dynamic platform to explore.

Read more about FLOKI

Meet Starknet (STRK)

StarkNet (STRK) is the core of the StarkNet platform, a permissionless decentralized zk-Rollup on Ethereum. It enables any dApp to achieve unlimited scale for its computation without compromising on security or decentralization. Their STRK token has three primary uses: payment of fees, governance, and staking.

Dive deeper into Starknet (STRK)

We’re also doing a STRK airdrop for our Bitstamp Earn customers staking ETH. If you held staked ETH (ETH2) as of September 15, 2022, at 6:42am UTC, you'll be eligible to receive STRK tokens directly in your Bitstamp account. Stay tuned for the airdrop date, which will be distributed in the next 14 days.

At Bitstamp, we’re always working to bring you a diverse and secure selection of cryptocurrencies. The addition of XCHNG, FLOKI, and STRK gives you more opportunities to diversify your portfolio.
